ygData.subject: Re: Side effect/Symptom of twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you on this one...  I started on Xegony the week the game went public - and I never begged and don t recall people begging.  I find it quite
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you on this one... I started on Xegony the week the game went
public - and I never begged and don't recall people begging. I find it
quite common. People begging for cash particularly bug me. On the other
hand - I had a level 6 bard (I'm 19) ask me very nicely I had any armor I
could spare. I did in fact have some stuff in the bank that I was too lazy
to try to sell - so I figured, what the hey - I'll help this guy out...

Slyde of Xegony
<Army of Virtue>
----- Original Message -----
From: Sean Gifford <giffords@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 9:06 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Side effect/Symptom of twinking


> From: "Sean Gifford" <giffords@...>
>
> One thing that I find, that I assume is related to twinking, is low level
> characters, begging for money or Items. Probably because their previous
> character was twinked by some high level char and they didn't have to work
> hard to get up in the world. And then they either moved servers, or
deleted
> their previous char and no one has come and thrown 100plat their way.
> anyone else notice this begging?
>
> Gleeman, Bard of the 15th chorus - Karana
